item.title: Automated
item.description: Automated pipelines for all development activities, allowing rapid, repeatable, and reliable progress.

item.title: Effective Requirements
item.description: Project goals and requirements clearly defined, documented, and prioritized with traceability through verification and validation.

item.title: Effective Testing
item.description: Testing that is appropriate, effective, and evolves with the project.

item.title: Emergent, Intentional Architecture
item.description: Architecture matching the inherent problem to be solved, evolved and documented as the project evolves.

item.title: Human-Centered Project Management
item.description: Expectations and risk management processes that value humans and their interactions as key to innovation.

item.title: Managed Environments
item.description: Exactly the same environment for all builds, fast and verifiable.

item.title: One Source
item.description: A single source for all artifacts, each with versioning and traceability.

item.title: Reliable
item.description: Care is given to ensuring the design and implementation provide a consistent and expected experience.

item.title: Secure
item.description: Security as a first-class requirement, accurately implemented.

item.title: Updateable and Observable
item.description: Able to observe and update the design and implementation during the entire product cycle.
